name: Senior Fullstack Engineer for a US Startup (NodeJS)
description:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer you will work on the Affluent SaaS Platform where you will drive and take ownership of various technologies to build features which will enable large-scale processing of data to support the Impact platform.

You will form part of an Agile / Scrum team where you will mentor squad members. This role assumes a certain independent capability to investigate and learn new technologies for the platform.

What You'll Do:

  • Review business needs, design, implement, test and perform code review for various features for the Affluent Platform
  • Gain and maintain a deep understanding of the business and product domain to deliver effective solutions
  • Provide transparency through daily Scrums, Kanban (or similar)
  • Identify, raise and address system vulnerabilities and technology blockers for the squad
  • Optimize code and streamline processes to improve performance and platform stability and reduce overall system load
  • Review error messages and fix bugs in a timely manner
  • Work in a distributed and agile environment
  • Responsible for continuous improvement of developer productivity

What You Have:

  • Bachelor in Computer Science or similar field of study or equivalent professional experience
  • 3+ years in a similar role
  • 3+ years experience working on Enterprise Solutions using NodeJS (essential)
  • 3+ years experience with SQL and database development, familiarity with Data Modeling concepts
  • 3+ years experience in Full Stack development, including front-end, back-end and databases
  • 3+ years experience with JavaScript and Front-end technologies
  • 3+ years experience working with Large Data Volumes and distributed systems (advantageous)
  • 3+ years experience working in a Start-up or Internet business (advantageous)
  • Familiarity with Web Services (REST or SOAP)
  • Github Account w/ showcased work / samples / contributions

Benefits/Perks:

  • Competitive Salary & Exposure to International Teams
  • Unlimited Paid Time Off Policy
  • Training & Development
  • Flexible work hours
  • Casual work environment

About Impact:

Affluent was acquired by Impact in March, 2021. Impact is the global leader in Partnership Automation, working with innovative brands like Ticketmaster, Levi’s, Microsoft, Airbnb, and Uber to help them manage their online affiliate, influencer, brand to brand, and content partnerships. The Impact Partnership Cloud covers the full life partnership lifecycle including onboarding, tracking ads and paying partners, recruiting for new partners, data and marketing intelligence, and protection from fraud. Founded in 2008, Impact has grown to over 500 employees and ten offices across Europe, the United States, Africa, and Asia so there is plenty of opportunity for growth and advancement.
